creditline: Gift of Robert and Gloria Congdon
description: Two Belts, c.1910-20,silk, cotton, natural dyes, applique, and embroidery. Snail and cockleshell designs. Originally sewn together at one end, silk sashes attached to the other two ends. Worn wrapped twice around the waist and tied with silk sashes. Part of a ceremonial costume.
medium: Silk, cotton, natural dyes; embroidery and appliqu√©
title: Pair of belts
